text: Yaqeenan woh log kafir hogaye jinhon ney kaha kay Allah hi maseeh ibn-e-mariyum hai aap inn say keh dijiye kay agar Allah maseeh ibn-e-marium aur uss ki walida aur ruy-e-zamin kay sab logon ko halak ker dena chahaye to kaun hai jo Allah Taalaa per kuch bhi ikhtiyar rakhta ho? Aasmanon-o-zamin aur dono kay darmiyan ka kul mulk Allah Taalaa hi ka hai woh jo chahata hai peda kerta hai aur Allah Taalaa her cheez per qadir hai
